_source.short_desc: Schedulicity is a scheduling app for small businesses who work with clients, complete with class management, marketing, and payment.
_source.long_desc:
Schedulicity is an all-in-one scheduling software that features appointment booking, class management, digital marketing, and payment tools. 

Check your calendar and adjust appointments on the go, customize waivers and policies, and use our Waitlist feature for overbooked classes. 

Set up automatic emails and text reminders to cut down no-shows, and get paid (and tipped!) faster with built-in payment processing and our pay-by-text tech, Norm.
_source.pricing_details:
Schedulicity Free offers up to 10 bookings per month, provider notifications (email and text), email reminders for clients, free business and client apps (iOS and Android), simple marketing tools, and email support. 

Schedulicity Unlimited offers everything in the Free plan, plus unlimited appointments and classes; robust marketing tools, including email and text reminders, personalized emails, and automation; built-in payment processing at 2.5% + 15? for every transaction; waitlists, waivers, and no-show protection; customizable packages, discounts, and auto-billing; and unlimited phone and email support.

The Unlimited Plan starts at $34.99 for solo providers. Add up to five additional providers for $10 per month per provider, totaling $44.99 to $84.99 per month. 

If you have seven or more providers, add them all for $94.99 per month.
_source.target_audience: Service-based and client-focused small businesses that operate via appointments, classes, workshops, and more.

media.caption: Business App + Client App: So you can use Schedulicity anywhere, at anytime and your clients can book with you on the go.
Marketing: You do great work, and we want people to know about it. Schedulicity's automated marketing tools build buzz, bring in new customers, and keep them coming back from more.
Schedulicity Marketplace: Boost your visibility with a spot on our Marketplace, with over 65,000 appointments booked a day.
Introducing Norm: Record transactions and process payments directly from a booking. Pay-by-phone checkout with Norm.
Appointment Scheduling: Booking has never been easier for you and your clients. Our powerful appointment scheduling software gives you the foresight and control to better manage your time.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is proudly part of the QuickBooks family, and works alongside leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, Xero and MYOB. Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place."

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule employees' working hours, make plans on a timeline, organize shifts and track time spend on each assignment with Clockify.
related_products.features: Clockify enables simple scheduling with an overview of project milestones, total assigned hours, assignees and task length. Complete data can be broken down by team members to check their capacity and see their assignments in detail. You can schedule tasks across different shifts, define start times for each task and define a daily hours limit. Customize non-working days in your scheduling process, drag & drop directly in a schedule to make adjustments.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody scheduling software is tailored to wellness businesses that need scheduling and business management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a project management software with prebuilt templates, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, automated approvals, reporting, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is an award-winning project management and scheduling software trusted by 20,000+ companies and over two million users worldwide. Schedule projects using custom-field request forms, resource management and allocation, Gantt charts, time tracking, shared calendars, automated reports, approvals, and workload overviews. Automate your processes with Wrike's 400+ applications. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: The leading employee scheduling app for agencies, studios and firms. Trusted by brands including RGA, Vice and Buzzfeed.
related_products.features: The leading employee scheduling app for agencies, studios and firms. Since 2012, Float has been helping the world's top teams, including RGA, Vice and Buzzfeed, forecast their time. Beautifully simple design, lightening-fast technology, real-time collaboration. Float's intuitive drag-and-drop interface makes scheduling your team simple. Float has mobile apps for iOS and Android. Integrate with Slack, Google Calendar, Outlook and 1,000+ apps via Zapier. Free to try for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.
related_products.features: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks like scheduling and organizing meetings fast and easy. The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Scheduling Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Scheduling Maintenance Software is a modern maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

Send automatic payment reminders and take payments instantly in-person, online within 24 hours, or automatically every month. With a mobile app, free training, and simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service.

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust employee scheduling, communication, and engagement tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!

With a free app for staff to submit availability requests, swap shifts, and chat, building schedules that work for everyone has never been so easy. Start free today!

similar_products.short_desc: An affordable & intuitive all-in-one employee scheduling app for deskless teams. Start for free!

Premium plans start at just 29$/month for up to 30 users. Start for free now!

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you can focus on what matters most to you.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. similar_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.

mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.features: Visual Planning is a full-scale scheduling platform tailored with schedulers in mind. Monitor project workflows, and relevant data using custom dashboards. Schedule across all devices for a collaborative management platform. Tailor a scheduling solution that meets your business' needs.  Sign up for a free custom demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. Square Appointments is an integrated POS that comes with online scheduling and payment processing so that you can run your whole business from one place. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage projects: scheduling, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
Scheduling software for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Facility Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Facility Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Facility Management software enables organizations to more effectively administer facility and plant assets. Details such as building layouts, assets, employees, and square footage are recorded and made readily accessible. Facility Management solutions allow for easy access to drawings and schematics, room scheduling, preventative maintenance tasks, work orders, and records for equipment including lighting, security, HVAC, elevators, and fire alarms. Facility Management software is related to Fixed Asset Management software, Building Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, HVAC software, Maintenance Management software, EHS Management software, Visitor Management software, and Scheduling software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.description: Production Scheduling software enables advanced planning and scheduling of production activities within the manufacturing industry. These applications enable organizations to keep track of production resources and capabilities, effectively allocate resources, and operate efficiently. Production Scheduling software also aids manufacturers in forecasting and benchmarking performance, making real-time manufacturing decisions, holding down costs and improving delivery performance. Production Scheduling software is related to Manufacturing Execution Systems and MRP software.

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Website Integration
category_features.definition: Seamlessly integrates with 3rd party websites

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Badge Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and print wearable badges with attendee information

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: ID Scanning
category_features.definition: Scan, record and validate an ID barcode.

category_features.name: Pre-Registration
category_features.definition: Allow users to manage pre-registration formalities for the business

category_features.name: Registration Management
category_features.definition: Make a list of and register attendees for an event

category_features.name: Self Check-in/Check-out
category_features.definition: Allow visitors to perform check-in by themselves.

category_features.name: Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Track visitor in-time, out-time, and purpose of visits.

category_features.name: Watch List
category_features.definition: Match visitors against a "watch list" and notify security staff of their presence.

category_features.name: Class Management
category_features.definition: Create and schedule group classes, recurring appointments, and private sessions, etc.

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can schedule appointments online

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Accept payments for regular classes, events, memberships, private sessions, etc. online through the website or app.

category_features.name: Staff Management
category_features.definition: Schedule shifts for staff/employees, track hours worked, and manage staff payroll.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Whip your schedule into shape by letting Acuity do all the heavy lifting. Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to smartly fill & manage your schedule. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity's there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly, even as business gets busier?all without breaking a sweat.

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one fitness scheduling software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send text & email marketing messages. Build waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Software for fitness professionals to manage and track their client's training and nutrition programs. Start your Free 30-Day Trial.
related_products.features:
My PT Hub is an all-in-one software for fitness professionals to manage their clients by creating customizable training and nutrition programs while tracking their progress and achievements. Get started with our Free 30-Day Trial.

NEW Marketing Features:
- Accelerate your business with Google Ads, all from within your My PT Hub account
- Showcase your business with MySite, your own virtual storefront

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody fitness software streamlines your business management; class scheduling, memberships, payments, virtual classes and more.

Step up your studio with online classes, marketing automations, scheduling, auto-renewal memberships, staff and member management, payment processing, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for the fitness industry! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.

You get a full blown website where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs and service add-ons on top of accepting payments through the POS system. Sync appointments with popular online calendars, and get detailed statistics about your business. Check out SimplyBook.me to see all our features!

related_products.features: Streamline operations, boost staff efficiency, and delight members with Zenoti, the complete fitness software solution. More than 20,000 wellness businesses worldwide trust Zenoti to help them scale. On average, clients experience double-digit increases in customer retention, staff retention, and revenue growth.

related_products.short_desc: Save time and grow your business with the #1 online platform built for coaches and gym owners. Try TrueCoach free for 14 days.

Starting at just $19 per month. Try TrueCoach completely risk-free for 14 days, no credit card required, cancel any time.

related_products.short_desc: Timely salon software runs your whole business from any device. Easily manage your calendar, clients, staff, stock, reporting & more!
related_products.features:
Meet Timely: simple software to get your business running beautifully. With an easy-to-use booking system, customisable online forms, personalised messages and all your client info in your pocket, our customers love Timely - and their clients love it just as much.

Join our community of 55,000 beauty professionals and get access to innovative business management software, award-winning customer support, and education from the biggest industry names. 

Start a free 14-day trial at gettimely.com.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, powerful, appointment booking software for service providers and their clients. Includes online calendar and downloadable app.
related_products.features:
Simple, powerful, appointment booking tool that you and your clients will love! Use the scheduler anywhere: the app or any browser. Customers can book with ease using the Visibook app or online calendar.
Easy booking and customer tracking.
Reduce no-shows.
Individual and class scheduler.
Payments tool.
Client messaging and notes.
Simple, free set up.
Control your schedule.
Work around your personal calendar.
Less email and hassle.
Manage staff.
Multi-Platform tool.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you could ever want or need to become a successful online personal trainer and fitness coach, all in one place.
related_products.features:

Packed with powerful features and stunningly simple to use, we've crafted PTD to make running your fitness training empire a pure joy. We are trusted by thousands of  Trainers just like you! Check out our latest award: Top Performer on Capterra.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for Fitness Studios.

We offer the fitness & wellness industry an affordable, easy-to-use, fully customizable platform that streamlines business management. Dynamic tools include online booking solutions, POS, payroll, reputation management, email/SMS marketing suite, rewards program, robust reporting, and so much more! It's the only software you need to run and grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Walla is a modern boutique studio software built to save time, capture revenue, and retain more clients.

Built by a team of fitness industry experts who have been behind the front desk and behind the scenes of global wellness tech platforms, our goal is to simplify everyday business operations through intuitive time-saving touchpoints. 

With a sleek, modern design, Walla's user-centric platform has the exact features studios and staff need to run their fitness business more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Ensure a free flow of clients in and out of facilities by defining access parameters at each point of entry. Eliminate bottlenecks!

Do everything from managing schedules & conflicts, offering rentals, managing staff permissions, client access, and more - under one roof. Save both time and money. Our facility calendar makes managing facility schedules easier than ever. Manage all facilities through a single interface while keeping rentals, reservations, and maintenance blocks in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Comprehensive easy-to-use fitness center management software.
similar_products.features:
Run your gym with Insight! 

Built from the ground up by gym owners, Gym Insight is a comprehensive software system designed to make your fitness business more profitable. Customizable dashboards and comprehensive reports let you track a multitude of stats including account payment status, monthly dues, and more!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.description: Personal Trainer software assists fitness professionals to schedule and track workout sessions for their clients, as well as collecting payments, and automating communication.
